dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S754 IS: Shellfish Marketing Assistance Fairness Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Specialty Crops Competitiveness Act of 2004 to include farmed shellfish as specialty crops.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Shellfish Marketing Assistance Fairness Act.
Section 3(1) of the Specialty Crops Competitiveness Act of 2004 (7 U.S.C. 1621 note; Public Law 108â€“465) is amended by inserting farmed shellfish, after fruits,.
